title: Mediterranean Odyssey
inclusions_evidence: FREE FLIGHT OFFER Companion Fly Free up to AUD$2,500* per booking
Private veranda stateroom with king-size bed

other.notes: Assumed average costs for excursions based on similar cruises.

reasoning: The travel agency deal includes flights and comprehensive inclusions, making it significantly cheaper than DIY options.
additional_notes: This deal offers a great value considering the included flights and amenities.
